translation1: "Today, let's take a look at some [strange search trends]. What is a normal search trend? I will randomly select three hot search terms: the Lunar New Year on February 2nd, the increase in the price of good friends, and the commodity price-raising incident. The search trend spreads and forms a wave, and then [the trend decreases exponentially] (smooth curve), eventually dissipating. If a secondary search trend occurs, a small wave will reappear.They look exactly the same as the【Network Sentiment Evolution Model】displayed on the official website of the Cyberspace Administration of China. What is abnormal sentiment? Randomly select six hot searches from the same event and present【isolated peak】、【jagged】、【cliff】.The following text is a description of three different types of events in Chinese social media:  【孤峰状】This refers to an event that quickly rises to the top of the hot search list due to public interest, such as a sudden increase in temperature.  【锯齿状】This refers to an event that periodically rises to the top of the hot search list, ensuring that the topic remains popular.  【断崖状】This refers to a collective withdrawal from the topic, indicating that the hot search has fulfilled its \"function,\" and the topic has moved on to a new battlefield. In Figure 9, the peak of one event's heat wave coincides with the trough of another event's heat wave, with time differences of only seconds, indicating that it is likely that the unified water army was given a new mission and launched a new offensive. The professionalization of black public opinion can be seen in the dozens of hot searches simultaneously appearing on the list, with some attracting attention, some responsible for knowledge dissemination, some creating strategic opportunities, some diverting attention, some influencing cognition, somePropaganda is a science, discarding subjective factors such as stance and emotions, and only relying on objective data. Even black public relations will have no place to hide. Everyone who passes by will leave a trace, and we will excavate these traces together. Data source: Time machine."

translation1: "Is taking a bath in a bathtub with foam on your feet a sign of a leak? Choosing an appropriate bathtub can have good therapeutic effects on your feet, and today's Country Style editor will answer this question for you, hoping to be helpful to friends. With the enhancement of people's health awareness, bathtubs have become more and more popular among consumers, and a variety of products with different specifications have emerged on the market, ranging from hundreds of yuan to thousands of yuan, providing consumers with a wide range of choices.On the relevant data, compared to traditional home appliances, health-related home appliances such as bathtubs are selling hot, but there is no special industry standard for bathtubs, so there are certain safety risks. \"It's too dangerous to soak your feet in electric water!\" Mr. Li told the reporter. Recently, he bought a bathtub as a gift for his father's birthday, but when his father soaked his feet in it, he felt a tingling sensation in his feet.At first, Mr. Li thought it was the vibration function of the bathtub that caused the sensation, but after turning off the vibration function, his father still felt a tingling sensation in his feet. Mr. Li tried writing with a pen, and to his surprise, the pen lit up. Mr. Li discovered that the water in the bathtub was electrified. Later, he contacted the store, and the store's attitude was not bad. Although they refunded the bathtub, Mr. Li still felt uncomfortable.Because he found that there is no clear and detailed industry regulation for the popular bathtub, such as whether it is suitable for what kind of people, what kind of materials are used, and whether it is safe at the highest setting. However, in general, bathtubs do not have electricity problems, but it is not ruled out that some products may not be strictly controlled during manufacturing. Therefore, when purchasing a bathtub, it is recommended to choose a disassembled type.Water and electricity separation has no safety hazards. At the same time, you can freely use the pen to test."

translation1: "Education News: The proportion of gifted students in Beijing's 2016 middle school entrance examination was reduced. According to a report by the Xinhua News Agency on January 21st and 22nd, the work of organizing the middle school entrance examination for gifted students in Beijing was unified by each district education committee. This year, the admission ratio of gifted students in Beijing's various districts has been reduced, and the competition among gifted students has become more intense.Using Beijing's Dongcheng District as an example, the proportion of primary and middle school students with special talents entering high school does not exceed 5% of the total planned enrollment of the district, and the planned enrollment is 380 people. The admission rate does not exceed 10% of the school's planned enrollment. Students with sports, art, and science and technology specialties who have registered online are eligible to participate in the special talent enrollment examination. To facilitate students' participation in the examination, the Dongcheng District continues the examination arrangement adopted last year, and sets up 1-2 examination sites in each school district, with a total of 13 examination sites.The examination points are divided into examination zones, and the examination time is divided into time periods. On the day of the examination, students will enter the examination points in different examination zones and take the examination according to the time periods. On May 23rd, the list of students who passed the examination will be announced on the website of the district education admission examination center, and students can query the examination results online."

translation1: "The upper reaches of the Yangtze River have achieved full coverage of water-based green integrated service areas - Xinhua Net, December 11, 2022 (reporter Wang Xian). The Chongqing Yuzhong Water-based Green Integrated Service Area was officially put into operation on December 10, following the opening of the Emei Water-based Green Integrated Service Area in Sichuan's Leshan City on December 8. This is the second water-based green integrated service area on the upper reaches of the Yangtze River to be officially put into operation, after the Leshan Water-based Green Integrated Service Area. With this, the water-based green integrated service area has covered the upper, middle, and lower reaches of the Yangtze River.The Ministry of Transport and the Yangtze River Waterway Management Bureau's deputy director, Qi Jianhua, introduced that provinces such as Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui, and Jiangsu have already established 10 water-based green comprehensive service areas along the upper and lower reaches of the Yangtze River, which have been well received by the majority of ship crews and have played an important role in promoting the high-quality development of Yangtze River shipping. The establishment of water-based green comprehensive service areas is another milestone event in the construction of green Yangtze River shipping, and it has significantly improved the reception of ship pollutants and the service capacity of shipping. According to the introduction, water-based green comprehensive service areas are important facilities that provide comprehensive production and living services for ships and ship crews, and help ship crews solve their \"urgent, anxious, and worried\" problems.This time, the two water service areas on the upstream of the Yangtze River have been successfully put into operation. They are integrated service areas that combine living services, production services, and government services, with green environmental protection as the main theme and ship repair and ship emergency rescue services as the highlight. By realizing \"one-stop berthing and multiple services\" for ships in the port, it will make the work of ship crew members more efficient and their lives more convenient."

translation1: "What is the correct way to drink Red Label whisky? Everyone has different tastes, some people like to collect, some people like to eat delicious food, of course, there are also people who like to drink wine, Red Label whisky is one of the best-selling Scottish whiskies in various countries, and it has also won a gold medal at the International Wine Competition. Each bottle of Red Label whisky has a unique taste, but if you don't know how to appreciate it, isn't that a waste of its fragrant aroma?So, how do you drink the red label whiskey? Let me introduce it to you in a simple way. The drinking method for red label whiskey is as follows:Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky is made from about 35 types of Scottish whisky and has a strong and fragrant aroma with the characteristics of traditional Scottish whisky. The aroma contains a sweet and smoky flavor. The taste is strong and refreshing, with a hint of mint and a strong smoky flavor of roasted barley. This whisky can be enjoyed on its own or mixed with your favorite drink.Red Label whiskey has entered the domestic market, in order to suit the taste of the Chinese people, Red Label whiskey + Coca-Cola or Sprite or New Coke, etc. carbonated drinks have become a fashionable drink that lasts forever. These sweet drinks, in addition to being able to neutralize acidity, can bring visual pleasure and add a refreshing taste to the drink. Red Label whiskey + sliced lemon + granulated sugar (powdered sugar can also be used), is the most authentic and traditional way to drink.The flavor of genuine red label whisky is slightly acidic, and adding sugar can neutralize its acidity. Lemon can bring a refreshing citrus aroma to the whisky, of course, the sweet-sour balance can be adjusted according to personal taste preferences. Above three ways are the best way to drink red label whisky, and everyone can try them as a reference, hoping that the introduction can help everyone."

Moreover, the latter part of the text extensively uses the term 'red label whiskey' repetitively, which impedes the ease of reading - variations such as 'it', 'this whiskey' could have been used. Finally, the sentence 'These sweet drinks, in addition to being able to neutralize acidity, can bring visual pleasure.' is a bit unclear about how a drink can bring 'visual pleasure'. Despite these minor issues, the text conveys the intended message clearly." } }

translation1: "The first contemporary art biennial in Saudi Arabia, the Diriyah Biennial of Contemporary Art, was officially opened to the public on December 11 in the northwest of Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia. The biennial is co-organized by the Diriyah Biennial of Contemporary Art Foundation and the UCCA Dune Art Museum in China. A total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia, China, and other countries are participating in the exhibition. The artistic director of the exhibition is Zhang Ga, the director of the UCCA Dune Art Museum.According to the introduction by the curatorial team, the theme of this year's double exhibition is \"Touching the Stones to Cross the River\", which represents the reform strategies taken during the period of social economic transformation and also reflects the current situation of Saudi cultural development. This year's double exhibition covers an area of nearly 12,000 square meters, with six interconnected buildings presenting six units: \"Touching the Stones to Cross the River\", \"Inheritance as an Experiment\", \"Edge Thinking\", \"Towards the Public\", \"Beautiful New World\", and \"On the Spirit of Art\". Among the 27 Saudi artists' works, more than 40% are included, covering painting, installation art, and performance art, among others; 12 Chinese artists' works are also highly anticipated, some of whom use innovative ways to create art using recycled materials, such as Xu Bing's \"Behind the Story Series: The Endless Mountain in the Creek\" (2014), which reconstructs a classic landscape painting using discarded materials.According to Bakkili, the chief executive officer of the Diraiye Foundation, he hopes that this year's biennial exhibition can establish an international dialogue and allow global audiences to understand the cultural and creative industries and creative communities in Saudi Arabia, and strengthen exchanges and interactions. Tian Pengyu said: \"The objective of the biennial exhibition is double-edged, enabling Saudi contemporary art to participate in global dialogue and allowing Saudi audiences to immerse themselves in the world of contemporary art.\" It is reported that during the period of the opening of the biennial exhibition, a series of lectures will be held, and artists, curators, and leaders of the creative industry will discuss topics such as cross-cultural communication and the development of contemporary art."
gpt_response: { "Fluency": { "Score": "5", "Explanation": "The text is highly fluent with no grammatical errors, unnatural wording, or stiff syntax. The sentences flow naturally, and the use of language is appropriate for the context." } }

translation1: "In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a factory building located in Yiwu Town, Zhejiang Province, from his house. After visiting the site multiple times, Mr. Lu decided to buy the factory building. In December 2020, Mr. Lu negotiated the details of the purchase with the owner's family member Lin and paid a deposit of 200,000 yuan by transferring the money through a bank. Lin signed the \"Factory Building Purchase and Sale Agreement\" as the recipient of the deposit, stating that if the buyer did not want to buy the factory building, the deposit would be returned to the seller, and if the seller did not want to sell the factory building, the deposit would be doubled and returned to the buyer. Both parties agreed to sign the factory building purchase and sale agreement within a week.However, after the two parties failed to reach a consensus on issues such as the scope of the factory and the payment method in the sales contract, the house purchase contract was delayed and could not be signed. Considering that the two parties could not reach a consensus on the contract terms, a few days later, Mr. Lin decided to refund the 20,000 yuan deposit to Mr. Lu. After finally finding a house that he liked, paid the deposit, and was ready to pay the balance, he was just one step away from signing the contract, but the seller refused to sell, which made Mr. Lu feel helpless and angry.Therefore, Mr. Lu will file a lawsuit against Mr. Lin in Yueyang City People's Court. The court after reviewing the case found that the two parties were unable to sign a formal contract and cannot solely blame the defendant. It is reasonable to assume that the negotiation failed, and thus this case should not apply to the penalty for non-payment of deposit. The defendant is not required to bear the responsibility for breaching the contract and returning double the deposit. After the first-instance ruling, the plaintiff appealed.Recently, the appellate court upheld the original judgment. [Legal Advice] In the trading process, it is necessary to exercise due diligence. As the buyer, it is necessary to exercise due diligence in the signing of the contract, such as verifying the information of the property owner, whether the property is occupied, and other relevant information, and clearly stating the specific time and place of delivery in the contract to avoid disputes between the parties when performing the contract."
gpt_response: { "Fluency": { "Score": "4", "Explanation": "The text is mostly fluent with proper grammar and word usage, but a few points seem slightly unnatural. For example, 'Mr. Lu learned about a factory building located in Yiwu Town, Zhejiang Province, from his house.' could be made more fluent by rephrasing it as 'Mr. Lu found out about a factory building in Yiwu Town, Zhejiang Province, near his house.' Also, the transition between sentences could be smoother to improve the overall flow of the text. Finally, 'Mr. Lin decided to refund the 20,000 yuan deposit to Mr. Lu' seems to conflict with the earlier statement mentioning 'a deposit of 200,000 yuan'. This could be a typo, and if so, it affects the fluency of the text. Overall, despite these minor issues, the story conveyed in the text is easy to understand without any major impediments." } }

Jiaqi and another sister (sorry, I can't remember her name) did my makeup with great patience and it looked very natural.The outdoor photoshoot was in Wuxi City, and fortunately, the weather was good that day, so I didn't feel too cold. During the photo shoot, the makeup artist occasionally paid attention to our clothes and accessories and quickly arranged them if they looked a little messy. The photographer was also very funny and made us feel happy throughout the day. When we were choosing the photos, we didn't want to delete too many photos online, but we didn't add any extra photos during the selection process. We just chose the 24 photos included in the package and didn't add any extra ones (I heard that my cousin who had a wedding dress photoshoot charged over 7,000 yuan for a package that included over 10,000 photos, which surprised me and made me afraid that I would choose too many).Today the photos were retouched and Lan Lan gave them to me. I looked at two that I didn't think were very good, and they immediately helped me re-retouch them. I turned over the photos my sister took before and compared them, and I was really satisfied with our photos. They are simple and fresh, just the style I wanted. I sincerely recommend everyone to go to Xuan Han Jin Fu Ren to take their wedding dress photos!Package price: 3999 yuan. Dear wives, I sincerely wish you all a happy and prosperous life. translation1: "In the United States, 360 episodes of a TV show were shot in one location. The address is No. 156, South Ring Road, Happy Family Garden, 12th Floor. Initially, I learned about it through a friend because of trust, so I chose to go and take a look. At first, my budget was 70,000 yuan for a basic renovation.When you arrive at the store, a series of tricks begin. This is my first time visiting the store, and I only showed them my floor plan. They didn't go to the actual site to measure the house, yet they were able to quote me that my 135 square meter house could be done for 700,000 RMB. I'm not sure what kind of materials they used, as I didn't pay much attention to their materials. Their second trick is that you can just come to the store and hand over the deposit (once you've paid the deposit, you can never get your money back unless you have enough experience and know how to deal with them).When I was hesitating whether to pay the deposit or not, they would invite their so-called manager to tell you that if you pay the deposit to us today, we can give you such and such a discount. This is a trap, and I am a living example of being deceived. When I was caught up in the moment, I paid a deposit of over 10,000 yuan. The quote they gave me had many problems: it did not include water and electricity renovation, nor did it include any doors or cabinets for the bathroom. These three items alone account for a significant portion of the basic renovation costs.They charge higher fees for their services compared to other companies. I lost trust in this company after they didn't disclose everything upfront and made me sign a contract. When I tried to get my money back, they acted like a professional team with a dedicated group to handle the situation.Regardless of how it is, it will be the customer's problem and they are completely irresponsible. They keep shifting the blame and there are many details that I don't want to go into, but in the end, it's all tears. In short, don't choose them because my friends who hired them for renovation also had poor quality, and they will calculate various expenses for you in the future. Scumbag, they are the original con artists in the decoration industry, and now they have changed their name to a big and beautiful one, as if they have closed down and reopened under a different name.So don't choose such a shoddy renovation company. In the future, when choosing, please take a closer look and check these out. Renovation is not a small matter. If you want to ask the merchant, please log in or register first.Strictly prohibited from publishing various forms of merchant reviews, please refer to the merchant registration statement for the latest merchant information, such as address, phone number, business hours, and more. Visit the public channel for 360 integration of home decoration and design in Kunming."

translation1: "The 13th Provincial Tea Expo Opens - Eye-catching Headlines - Hunan Daily Online - Hunan Daily Network December 10, 2022 (Full Media Reporter Zhang Shanwu, Hu Minmin, Correspondent Li Xiaoling, Photographer Li Jian) This morning, the 13th Hunan Tea Industry Expo and the New Chahua Red Tea Promotion Conference was held at the Hunan International Convention and Exhibition Center, showcasing the tea industry, innovating tea technology, promoting tea culture, and accelerating the goal of a trillion-dollar tea industry. The Vice Chairman of the All-China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives, He Suilie, and the Vice Chairman of the Hunan Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Ye Hong, attended the opening ceremony.Professor Liu Zhonghua, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, introduced at the opening ceremony: The source of Huanglong tea is in a new phase, and the rise of red tea injects new vitality into \"Five-Colored Yangtze Tea\". In recent years, the provincial committee and government have strongly supported the development of the tea industry and promoted the construction of a trillion-yuan Yangtze tea industry, forming a development pattern of \"Three-Lake, Four-Water, Five-Color Tea\". The tea industry in the province has increased innovation, with green tea, black tea, and red tea as the main force, and the main tea-producing areas have promoted the integration of tea tourism, driving the increase in income for large tea farmers.Fengshui turns, red tea gains strength. Tea experts in the province say that when green tea and black tea are harvested, tea farmers have income all year round. The output value of tea gardens continues to rise. At the opening ceremony, provincial leaders awarded the \"Lake Red Tea\" trademark to the fourth batch of enterprises authorized to use it, and New Hope held the \"Source of Lake Red Tea\".In the New Tea Hall in Hangzhou, tea merchants from Fujian were impressed by a high-mountain tea named \"Ice in Spring\" and immediately placed an order. The Secretary-General of the Provincial Tea Association, Wang Zhen, expressed his happiness, saying that the epidemic and other factors have affected the tea market to some extent, but from the scene of the tea fair, the highlights are everywhere. The New Tea in Hangzhou is red, infused with the cultural essence of tea, and the popularity and trading are booming. The tea industry in the region is looking forward to a new spring."

translation1: "According to a recent report from the Xinhua News Agency, the Jiangxi Province in China plans to train 10,000 rural elementary school music, art, and physical education teachers within the next three years to strengthen the teacher team and promote balanced development of rural compulsory education. Starting from 2016, the Jiangxi Province will allocate three years to train one music, art, and physical education teacher for each rural elementary school (village and below) in the province, with a total of 10,000 teachers to be trained. The training objectives are rural elementary school teachers aged 45 or below with music, art, and physical education knowledge or talents, who can also teach other subjects in addition to music, art, and physical education.Through training, they will acquire basic knowledge and teaching skills in the field of aesthetics, update their teaching concepts and ideas, master modern teaching methods, enhance their teaching ability, activity design ability, campus culture ability, and self-development ability, and build a team of multi-skilled music and aesthetics teachers. This will help alleviate the problem of shortage of rural music and aesthetics teachers. To ensure the quality and effectiveness of the training, Jiangxi has planned to train one music, art, and sports teacher from each of the 100 counties (cities, districts) in the province, with a total of 300 trainees. This will comprehensively enhance their teaching exemplary leadership ability, teaching research activity design ability, teaching ability, training ability, and ability to participate in online training workshops, and play the roles of teaching, exemplifying, guiding, and supervising."

translation1: "The State Council Joint Prevention and Control Mechanism recently issued a notice to strengthen the epidemic prevention and control work in border cities. The notice requires that people who leave land border cities (excluding those with a border with Hong Kong and Macao) within 48 hours must have a negative nucleic acid test result, and after arriving in the land border city, they must undergo at least one nucleic acid test. The time range for the above requirements is from the date of determining the border city range and announcing it in each province, autonomous region, and municipality, to March 15, 2022.In addition, it is noted that under certain conditions, cities at the border can study the establishment of a buffer zone for epidemic prevention and control within their jurisdiction. The National Health Commission's Office of Disease Prevention and Control has introduced that for some border cities, cross-border trade is the main pillar of the local economy, and there is frequent exchange between the two sides of the border. Implementing differentiated management policies based on the division of regions can turn the first line of defense from one to two lines, which may achieve the goal of reducing the risk of the epidemic spreading across the border and minimizing the social impact and cost of epidemic prevention and control.Recently, there have been several domestic cluster-type epidemics in our country, all of which were imported from overseas epidemic areas through border cities. The above notice points out that this exposes some problems such as delayed and inadequate local epidemic monitoring and early warning, poor implementation of closed-loop management for high-risk personnel, formalism in regular nucleic acid testing, insufficient disinfection of cold chain items at various nodes, inadequate management of centralized isolation facilities, and insufficient scientific and accurate handling of epidemic emergencies. The notice requires that efforts should be made from nine aspects, including improving the mechanism of border city epidemic control, strengthening the epidemic monitoring and early warning system, implementing border control measures, etc., to fill in the gaps in the epidemic prevention and control work of border cities, and to do a good job of epidemic prevention and control work in a rigorous and scientifically accurate manner, to tighten the defense line against the import of epidemics.Notice emphasizes that each border city should synchronize the study and deployment of epidemic prevention and ensuring people's livelihood work, publish and publicize the hotline for people's livelihood guarantee, regularly check and resolve hidden dangers in the supply of basic necessities such as food and prices, and promptly respond to and proactively address prominent issues raised by the public. According to the notice, the border cities referred to include the counties (cities, districts, banners) where land, water, and air ports are located, as well as the prefecture-level cities, autonomous regions, and municipalities where they are located, and the directly-administered municipalities. The specific scope shall be determined by each province (autonomous region, municipality) based on epidemic prevention needs and announced in a timely manner."
gpt_response: { "Fluency": { "Score": "5", "Explanation": "The text is highly fluent in English. The grammar, syntax, and word usage are all correct. The sentences are well constructed and the content is easy to understand." } }

translation1: "A group of Asian-American organizations filed a complaint with the U.S. Department of Education and the Justice Department on May 23, alleging that three Ivy League universities, including Yale University, Brown University, and Dartmouth College, discriminated against Asian-American applicants in the admissions process. The Asian American Education Foundation, which led the lawsuit, held a press conference in Washington on the same day to announce the complaint.The chairman of this organization, Wan Yuchong, said at a press conference that over the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission criteria of American top schools has doubled, but the proportion of Asians in these three schools has basically remained the same. Many studies have shown that these top schools discriminate against Asian applicants in their admission process through \"comprehensive consideration\". Wan Yuchong introduced that a study by Sanders et al. in 2014 showed that among these three schools, the relative number of applicants, Asians had the lowest admission rate compared to all other ethnic groups.According to data from the U.S. Department of Education, among Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian students. Yale University and Brown University have been implementing de facto racial quotas for Asian applicants for over 20 years. Zhao Yuchun told a reporter from Xinhua News Agency that they hope to submit a complaint and request that the U.S. Department of Education and the Justice Department investigate and take action to prevent these schools from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in their admissions. They also hope that the schools that are being sued will take this issue seriously and change their admission policies towards Asian students.Currently, the three universities that have been sued have not yet responded. The Asian American Education Foundation was established in 2015 and previously sued Harvard University for discriminatory admissions, but the US Department of Education did not accept the case due to procedural reasons. This time, in addition to the Chinese American community, other groups such as the Indian American, Japanese American, Korean American, and Pakistani American education organizations have also participated in the lawsuit."

translation1: "The joint exercise \"Peaceful Relief-2021\" between the armed forces of China and Vietnam has been successfully concluded. All participating Chinese troops have safely returned to the border region of Guangxi, China. This marks the successful completion of a seven-day training mission. During this exercise, the two armies focused on the major topic of humanitarian medical relief and closely followed the mission of emergency aid and disaster relief, completing joint command, joint field rescue, and mass treatment of casualties, effectively enhancing their emergency response capabilities.The results of the exercise were acknowledged by both the Chinese and Vietnamese militaries. During the closing ceremony, the chairman of the Vietnamese Exercise Guidance Committee and the deputy chief of the Vietnamese People's Army Logistics Department, Nguyen Xuan Phuc, said that through this exercise, Vietnamese medical personnel had learned about the organization and professional activities of Chinese medical personnel, as well as China's medical and support equipment. The results of the exercise demonstrated the professional capabilities of both countries' medical forces in medical assistance and epidemic prevention.The spokesperson for the Chinese Coordination and Cooperation Group, Chen Chunming, Vice Director of the Logistics Department of the Central Military Commission, expressed that this exercise is an innovative practice based on the successful joint medical mission in 2018, with significant milestone significance. During the exercise, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, and rapid nucleic acid testing instruments to the Vietnamese People's Army for health and epidemic prevention purposes."
